roleset.name: addition of a methyl group to an atom or group
roleset.note: METHYLATION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Slight comparison to hypermethylation. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from methylation.01-n)

example.name: methylate-v: passivized, with product of the reaction
example.text: Vanillin (I) is brominated (Br2/AcOH) to 5-bromovanillin (II) which is subsequently methylated to give 5-bromoveratraldehyde (III).

example.name: methylate-v: agent and instrument
example.text: To test this hypothesis, we methylated bacterial DNA with CpG methylase.

example.name: methylation-n
example.text: The methylation of the gene promoter
